public class GodsPanelController
extends java.lang.Object

Class GodsPanelController displays god cards on GUI.

    • chooseInit

      public void chooseInit​(java.util.List<Card> cards)
      Method chooseInit initializes the god panel for user's choosing action. It creates the buttons "Choose" and "Close" and prepares the command "CHOOSE <god-name>" to be sent to the server.
      Parameters:
      cards - of type List<Card> - the deck of cards.
